EmailTemplate.subject: Article: Software Defined Stores Pull Ahead in the Pandemic
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The pandemic has proved one thing for sure: the retail winners are those rolling out upgrades and new shopping experiences—fast. But what if you have hundreds of stores? Techs would have to install, maintain, integrate and manage your deployment…at every single site. It’s enough to make you think maybe the whole thing is too complex and expensive to do it all. But your competitors are innovating at scale. You have to keep up. What do you do? You take a software-defined approach like other stores who are not just surviving—but getting back to winning. Read how they’re doing it in our article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. Retailers taking that approach saw 164% ROI, payback within 6 months, $6.4 million in efficiency gains, a 50% cut in unplanned downtime and more. Whoa.
